bibl.title: Two Conjectures on Pindar's Fourth Paean (50-3).
bibl.note: P. Oxy. V, 841 (= Pack2 1361). Suspects that Pindar really wrote ... νομὸν περινάιον ('the dwellings about the temple' or 'the temples') in l. 51 and ... γαίας θέναρ in l. 53.
bibl.seg: LLOYD-JONES Hugh, Two Conjectures on Pindar's Fourth Paean (50-3).
P. Oxy. V, 841 (= Pack2 1361). Suspects that Pindar really wrote ... νομὸν περινάιον ('the dwellings about the temple' or 'the temples') in l. 51 and ... γαίας θέναρ in l. 53.
